content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #148

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: All message examples from the Event Catalog section should provide a complete example of the message

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira
Chapter/section: Event Catalog
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Clarification

Summary: All message examples from the Event Catalog section should provide a complete example of the message

Comment: All message examples from the Event Catalog section should provide a complete example of the message (e.g. Request Context Change Request).

This contributes to a better understanding from the reader.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

wmaethner commented on Issue #148:

Persuasive, do something similar to the request context change examples so that includes the headers and everything (especially since the events include the X-Hub-Signature which would benefit from being included in all examples).

wmaethner commented on Issue #148:

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
